attributes.action: Call for an immediate ceasefire in gaza and israeli withdrawal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The inactivity of 'civilised powers' in the face of an attack that is akin to the nazi forces blockade on the warsaw ghetto, done in the name of self defence by a country supplied with state of the art killing machines by the USA goes against all humanity, stop it now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
